sources.title: The Cocoanuts (1929) THE MARX BROTHERSüçï MAPCAP COMEDY MUSICAL
sources.description:
üçïPizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAYüçï
The Brothers: Chico, Groucho, Harpo, and Zeppo Marx
The Actors: Margaret Dumont, Kay Francis, Oscar Shaw, Mary Eaton
The Directors: Robert Florey, Joseph Santley 
The Writers: George S. Kaufman, Morrie Ryskind
The Music & Lyrics: Irving Berlin 

The Marx Brothers bring their signature brand of comic chaos to the big screen in their first feature film! Set in a Florida hotel during the land boom, Groucho plays a fast-talking, scheme-hatching hotel manager, with Chico and Harpo creating havoc at every turn. Zeppo, as always, plays the straight man to his brothers‚Äô lunacy. 

Margaret Dumont, their ever-dignified foil, is caught in a whirlwind of zany antics, while Mary Eaton and Oscar Shaw are entangled in romance and a jewel theft plot engineered by a devilish Kay Francis. Featuring lively song-and-dance numbers by Irving Berlin, this musical comedy captures the Marx Brothers' vaudevillian energy in all its madcap glory!

 If you love The Marx Brothers, slapstick comedy, or vintage musical films, don‚Äôt miss this gem! Like, comment, and subscribe for more classic movie uploads and rediscover the magic of early Hollywood! Watch now and enjoy the timeless comedy of The Marx Brothers in The Cocoanuts!

#MarxBrothers #ClassicComedy #GoldenAgeHollywood #MusicalComedy #IrvingBerlin #MargaretDumont #KayFrancis #HarpoMarx #GrouchoMarx #ChicoMarx #ZeppoMarx #OldHollywoodüì∫ Watch now and enjoy the timeless comedy of The Marx Brothers in The Cocoanuts!

metadata.Plot: Mr. Hammer runs a bankrupt Florida hotel. He'll try anything to make money, even make love to rich Mrs. Potter. But his main scheme, selling real estate, is in danger of sabotage from zanies Chico and Harpo, who also reduce the schemes of a pair of jewel thieves to chaos. A subplot involves the star-crossed love of Polly Potter and architect Bob Adams.
metadata.Actors: Groucho Marx, Harpo Marx, Chico Marx
